EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesCurr.label: Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesCurr.description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date, including liabilities incurred and payable to vendors for goods and services received, taxes, interest, rent and utilities, compensation costs, payroll taxes and fringe benefits (other than pension and postretirement obligations), contractual rights and obligations, and statutory obligations.

AccountsPayableRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.label: Accounts Payable, Related Parties, Noncurrent
AccountsPayableRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.description: Amount of accounts payable to related parties, due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

AccountsReceivableRelatedParties.label: Accounts Receivable, Related Parties
AccountsReceivableRelatedParties.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amount of receivables arising from transactions with related parties.

AccountsReceivableRelatedPartiesCurrent.label: Accounts Receivable, Related Parties, Current
AccountsReceivableRelatedPartiesCurrent.description: Amount of receivables arising from transactions with related parties due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.description: Accumulated change in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, net of tax effect, at period end. Excludes Net Income (Loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Includes foreign currency translation items, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gains and losses on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses related to factors other than credit losses on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities that an entity does not intend to sell and it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis, as well as changes in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsPremiumsAndO.label: Allowance for Doubtful Accounts, Premiums and Other Receivables
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsPremiumsAndO.description: The valuation allowance as of the balance sheet date to reduce the gross amount of receivables to estimated net realizable value, which would be presented in parentheses on the face of the balance sheet.

AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesProvisionF.label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Provision for Loss, Gross (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesProvisionF.description: Reflects the gross amount charged against earnings during the period as credit losses (bad debt expense) based on review of the loan and lease portfolio and application of the methodology for estimating credit losses.

AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesProvisionF.label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Provision for Loss, Net (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesProvisionF.description: Reflects the amount charged against earnings during the period as bad debt expense, net of recoveries of previously expensed credit losses.

AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesRealEstate.label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Real Estate
AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesRealEstate.description: The reserve to cover probable credit losses related to specifically identified fixed maturity real estate loans as well as probable credit losses inherent in the remainder of that loan portfolio.

AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesRecoveries.label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Recoveries of Bad Debts (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesRecoveries.description: Reflects a reduction in bad debt expense attributable to collections of loans and lease receivables which had previously been fully or partially charged off as bad debts.

AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesWriteOffs.label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Write-offs
AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesWriteOffs.description: Amount of loans and leases that have been written off from both loan receivables and allowance reserve for credit loss.

AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesWriteoffsN.label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses Write-offs, Net
AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesWriteoffsN.description: Amount, after recoveries, of loans and leases that have been written-off.

AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossRecoveryOfBa.label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Loss, Recovery of Bad Debts
AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossRecoveryOfBa.description: Amount of recovery of loans and lease receivables which had previously been fully or partially written-off as bad debts.

AllowanceForNotesAndLoansReceivableCurre.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AllowanceForNotesAndLoansReceivableCurre.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable, classified as current.

AllowanceForNotesReceivable.label: Allowance for Notes, Loans and Financing Receivable (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
AllowanceForNotesReceivable.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, the valuation allowance relating to a written agreement to receive money (at a specified future date(s), consisting of principal as well as any accrued interest) for the portion that is expected to be uncollectible.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesChangeInNetUnr.label: Available-for-sale Securities, Change in Net Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss) before Taxes (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesChangeInNetUnr.description: This item represents the pretax change in net unrealized holding gain (loss) on available-for-sale securities that has been included in accumulated other comprehensive income, a separate component of shareholders' equity, during the period.

CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

CashUninsuredAmount.label: Cash, Uninsured Amount
CashUninsuredAmount.description: The amount of cash as of the balance sheet date that is not insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.

CertificatesOfDepositAtCarryingValue.label: Certificates of Deposit, at Carrying Value
CertificatesOfDepositAtCarryingValue.description: A savings certificate entitling the Entity (that is, bearer) to receive interest at an established maturity date, based upon a fixed interest rate. A certificate of deposit may be issued in any denomination. Certificates of deposit are generally issued by commercial banks and, therefore, insured by the FDIC (up to the prescribed limit). Certificates of deposit generally restrict holders from withdrawing funds on demand without the incurrence of penalties. Generally, only certificates of deposit with original maturities of three months or less qualify as cash equivalents. Original maturity means original maturity to the entity holding the investment. As a related example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three-years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months.

CommonUnitAuthorized.label: Common Unit, Authorized
CommonUnitAuthorized.description: Maximum number of common units of ownership permitted to be issued by a limited liability company (LLC).

CommonUnitIssuanceValue.label: Common Unit, Issuance Value
CommonUnitIssuanceValue.description: Stated value of common units of ownership issued by a limited liability company (LLC).

CommonUnitIssued.label: Common Unit, Issued
CommonUnitIssued.description: Number of common units issued of limited liability company (LLC).

CommonUnitOutstanding.label: Common Unit, Outstanding
CommonUnitOutstanding.description: Number of common units of ownership outstanding of a limited liability company (LLC).

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income, attributable to parent entity. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

CostsAndExpenses.label: Costs and Expenses
CostsAndExpenses.description: Total costs of sales and operating expenses for the period.

DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Deferred Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredRevenue.label: Deferred Revenue
DeferredRevenue.description: Amount of deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

DeferredRevenuePeriodIncreaseDecrease.label: Deferred Revenue, Period Increase (Decrease)
DeferredRevenuePeriodIncreaseDecrease.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deferred revenue.

DeferredTaxAssetsPropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Property, Plant and Equipment
DeferredTaxAssetsPropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from property, plant, and equipment.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Operating Expense
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of operating expense attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Operating Income (Loss)
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of operating income (loss) attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Revenue
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of revenue attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DividendIncomeOperating.label: Dividend Income, Operating
DividendIncomeOperating.description: Amount of operating dividend income on securities.

Dividends.label: Dividends
Dividends.description: Amount of paid and unpaid cash, stock, and paid-in-kind (PIK) dividends declared, for example, but not limited to, common and preferred stock.

DueFromRelatedParties.label: Due from Related Parties
DueFromRelatedParties.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from related parties including affiliates, employees, joint ventures, officers and stockholders, immediate families thereof, and pension funds.

DueToRelatedPartiesCurrent.label: Due to Related Parties, Current
DueToRelatedPartiesCurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of obligations due all related parties. For classified balance sheets, represents the current portion of such liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

DueToRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Due to Related Parties
DueToRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of obligations due all related parties.

EarnestMoneyDeposits.label: Earnest Money Deposits
EarnestMoneyDeposits.description: A deposit made by a purchaser of real estate to evidence good faith. It is customary for a buyer to give the seller earnest money at the time a sales contract is signed. The earnest money generally is credited to the down payment at closing, which is applied at closing as a component of payment against the purchase price.

EquityMethodInvestmentAggregateCost.label: Equity Method Investment, Aggregate Cost
EquityMethodInvestmentAggregateCost.description: This element represents the aggregate cost of investments accounted for under the equity method of accounting.

EquityMethodInvestmentDividendsOrDistrib.label: Proceeds from Equity Method Investment, Distribution
EquityMethodInvestmentDividendsOrDistrib.description: Amount of distribution received from equity method investee for return on investment, classified as operating activities. Excludes distribution for return of investment, classified as investing activities.

EquityMethodInvestmentOwnershipPercentag.label: Equity Method Investment, Ownership Percentage
EquityMethodInvestmentOwnershipPercentag.description: The percentage of ownership of common stock or equity participation in the investee accounted for under the equity method of accounting.

EquityMethodInvestmentRealizedGainLossOn.label: Equity Method Investment, Realized Gain (Loss) on Disposal
EquityMethodInvestmentRealizedGainLossOn.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of an equity method investment.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of assets reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Cost of Sales (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of the cost of sales reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Current Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of current assets reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Gross Profit (Loss) (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of gross profit (loss) reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of liabilities reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Net Income (Loss) (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of net income (loss) reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Revenue (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: Amount of revenue from sale of product and rendering of service reported by equity method investee.

EquityMethodInvestments.label: Equity Method Investments
EquityMethodInvestments.description: This item represents the carrying amount on the entity's balance sheet of its investment in common stock of an equity method investee. This is not an indicator of the fair value of the investment, rather it is the initial cost adjusted for the entity's share of earnings and losses of the investee, adjusted for any distributions (dividends) and other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses recognized.

EscrowDepositsRelatedToPropertySales.label: Escrow Deposits Related to Property Sales
EscrowDepositsRelatedToPropertySales.description: Escrow deposits related to property sales in noncash investing and financing activities.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable from recovery.

FinancingReceivableModificationsNumberOf.label: Financing Receivable, Modifications, Number of Contracts (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
FinancingReceivableModificationsNumberOf.description: Number of financing receivables that have been modified by troubled debt restructurings.

FinancingReceivableModificationsRecorded.label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring
FinancingReceivableModificationsRecorded.description: Amount of financing receivable modified as troubled debt restructuring.

ForeclosedRealEstateExpense.label: Foreclosed Real Estate Expense
ForeclosedRealEstateExpense.description: Amount of expense recognized during the period for the foreclosure on real estate assets.

GainContingencyUnrecordedAmount.label: Gain Contingency, Unrecorded Amount
GainContingencyUnrecordedAmount.description: The amount or range of possible amounts of gain that could be realized upon the resolution of a contingency.

GainLossOnDispositionOfProperty.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
GainLossOnDispositionOfProperty.description: The gains (losses) included in results of operations resulting from the sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment, which do not qualify for treatment as discontinued operations. This item does not include any gain (loss) recognized on the sale of oil and gas property or timber property.

GainLossOnDispositionOfRealEstateDiscont.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Real Estate, Discontinued Operations
GainLossOnDispositionOfRealEstateDiscont.description: Amount of difference between the carrying amount and the sales price of real estate properties sold as part of discontinued operations.

GainLossOnSaleOfInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Investments
GainLossOnSaleOfInvestments.description: The net realized gain (loss) on investments sold during the period, not including gains (losses) on securities separately or otherwise categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity, which, for cash flow reporting, is a component of proceeds from investing activities.

GainLossOnSaleOfMortgageLoans.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Mortgage Loans
GainLossOnSaleOfMortgageLoans.description: The gains (losses) included in earnings that represent the difference between the sale price and the carrying value of loans made to finance real estate acquisitions. This element refers to the gain (loss) and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

GainLossOnSaleOfNotesReceivable.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Financing Receivable
GainLossOnSaleOfNotesReceivable.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale of financing receivable.

GainLossOnSaleOfOtherInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Other Investments
GainLossOnSaleOfOtherInvestments.description: Amount of gain (loss) included in earnings for investments classified as other.

GainLossOnSaleOfProperties.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Properties
GainLossOnSaleOfProperties.description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of real estate or properties that were intended to be sold or held for capital appreciation or rental income. This element refers to the gain (loss) included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

GainLossOnSaleOfProperty.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Oil and Gas and Timber Property
GainLossOnSaleOfProperty.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of oil and gas property or timber property.

GainLossOnSaleOfStockInSubsidiaryOrEquit.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Stock in Subsidiary or Equity Method Investee
GainLossOnSaleOfStockInSubsidiaryOrEquit.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.

GainLossOnSalesOfLoansNet.label: Gain (Loss) on Sales of Loans, Net
GainLossOnSalesOfLoansNet.description: The net gain (loss) resulting from a sale of loans, including adjustments to record loans classified as held-for-sale at the lower-of-cost-or-market and fair value adjustments to loan held for investment purposes.

GainLossRelatedToLitigationSettlement.label: Gain (Loss) Related to Litigation Settlement
GainLossRelatedToLitigationSettlement.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in settlement of litigation and insurance claims. Excludes claims within an insurance entity's normal claims settlement process.

GainsLossesOnSalesOfInvestmentRealEstate.label: Gains (Losses) on Sales of Investment Real Estate
GainsLossesOnSalesOfInvestmentRealEstate.description: The net gain (loss) resulting from sales and other disposals of real estate owned for investment purposes.

GainsLossesOnSalesOfOtherRealEstate.label: Gains (Losses) on Sales of Other Real Estate
GainsLossesOnSalesOfOtherRealEstate.description: The net gain (loss) resulting from sales and other disposals of other real estate owned, increases (decreases) in the valuation allowance for foreclosed real estate, and write-downs of other real estate owned after acquisition or physical possession.

GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: General and Administrative Expense
GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total of expenses of managing and administering the affairs of an entity, including affiliates of the reporting entity, which are not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableRelatedAllowa.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Related Allowance
ImpairedFinancingReceivableRelatedAllowa.description: Amount of allowance for credit losses related to recorded investment.

ImpairmentOfInvestments.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments
ImpairmentOfInvestments.description: The amount by which the fair value of an investment is less than the amortized cost basis or carrying amount of that investment at the balance sheet date and the decline in fair value is deemed to be other than temporary, before considering whether or not such amount is recognized in earnings or other comprehensive income.

ImpairmentOfRealEstate.label: Impairment of Real Estate
ImpairmentOfRealEstate.description: The charge against earnings in the period to reduce the carrying amount of real property to fair value.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperations.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperations.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the parent.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerBas.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Basic and Diluted Share
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerBas.description: The amount of net income (loss) from continuing operations per each basic and diluted share of common stock or unit when the per share amount is the same for both basic and diluted shares.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOut.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit, Basic and Diluted, Net of Tax
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOut.description: The amount of net income (loss) from continuing operations per each basic and diluted limited partnership and general partnership unit when the per unit amount is the same for both basic and diluted units.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOut.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic, Net of Tax
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOut.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder in a publicly trade limited partnership (LP) or master limited partnership (MLP).

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations and Disposal of Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Basic and Diluted Share
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Per basic and diluted share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation, when the per share amount is the same.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit, Basic and Diluted
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: The amount of income (loss) derived from discontinued operations during the period, net of related tax effect, per each basic and diluted limited partnership and general partnership unit when the per unit amount is the same for both basic and diluted units.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of gain (loss) on disposal of discontinued operations available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder.

IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.label: Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments
IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.description: Amount of income (loss) for proportionate share of equity method investee's income (loss).

IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestmentsNet.label: Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments, Net of Dividends or Distributions
IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestmentsNet.description: This element represents the undistributed income (or loss) of equity method investments, net of dividends or other distributions received from unconsolidated subsidiaries, certain corporate joint ventures, and certain noncontrolled corporations; such investments are accounted for under the equity method of accounting. This element excludes distributions that constitute a return of investment, which are classified as investing activities.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccr.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccr.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amounts payable to vendors for goods and services received and the amount of obligations and expenses incurred but not paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedInterestReceiva.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Interest Receivable, Net
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedInterestReceiva.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from borrowers for interest payments.

IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredRevenue.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Revenue
IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredRevenue.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

IncreaseDecreaseInDepositOtherAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deposit Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInDepositOtherAssets.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in moneys or securities given as security including, but not limited to, contract, escrow, or earnest money deposits, retainage (if applicable), deposits with clearing organizations and others, collateral, or margin deposits.

IncreaseDecreaseInDividendsReceivable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Dividends Receivable
IncreaseDecreaseInDividendsReceivable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in cash disbursements due from investments, representing the shareholders' portion of profits.

IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromRelatedParties.label: Increase (Decrease) in Due from Related Parties
IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromRelatedParties.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables to be collected from other entities that could exert significant influence over the reporting entity.

IncreaseDecreaseInDueToRelatedParties.label: Increase (Decrease) in Due to Related Parties
IncreaseDecreaseInDueToRelatedParties.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of obligations to be paid to the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entities' management; an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families; affiliates; or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

IncreaseDecreaseInNotesReceivables.label: Increase (Decrease) in Notes Receivables
IncreaseDecreaseInNotesReceivables.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of the amounts due from borrowers for outstanding secured or unsecured loans evidenced by a note.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating assets classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCash.label: Increase (Decrease) in Restricted Cash
IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCash.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) associated with funds that are not available for withdrawal or use (such as funds held in escrow) and are associated with underlying transactions that are classified as investing activities.

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

InterestIncomeDepositsWithFinancialInsti.label: Interest Income, Deposits with Financial Institutions
InterestIncomeDepositsWithFinancialInsti.description: Interest income derived from funds deposited with both domestic and foreign financial institutions including funds in money market and other accounts.

InterestIncomeOperating.label: Interest Income, Operating
InterestIncomeOperating.description: Amount of operating interest income, including, but not limited to, amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts on securities.

InterestPaid.label: Interest Paid, Including Capitalized Interest, Operating and Investing Activities
InterestPaid.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, including, but not limited to, capitalized interest and payment to settle zero-coupon bond attributable to accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount; classified as operating and investing activities.

InterestReceivable.label: Interest Receivable
InterestReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable.

InvestmentIncomeDividend.label: Investment Income, Dividend
InvestmentIncomeDividend.description: Amount of dividend income on nonoperating securities.

InvestmentOwnedBalanceShares.label: Investment Owned, Balance, Shares
InvestmentOwnedBalanceShares.description: Balance held at close of period in number of shares.

InvestmentsFairValueDisclosure.label: Investments, Fair Value Disclosure
InvestmentsFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of investment securities, including, but not limited to, marketable securities, derivative financial instruments, and investments accounted for under the equity method.

InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssoc.label: Investments in and Advance to Affiliates, Subsidiaries, Associates, and Joint Ventures
InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssoc.description: Amount of investment in equity method investee and investment in and advance to affiliate.

LettersOfCreditOutstandingAmount.label: Letters of Credit Outstanding, Amount
LettersOfCreditOutstandingAmount.description: The total amount of the contingent obligation under letters of credit outstanding as of the reporting date.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LineOfCreditFacilityIncreaseDecreaseForP.label: Line of Credit Facility, Increase (Decrease), Net
LineOfCreditFacilityIncreaseDecreaseForP.description: Amount of increase (decrease) of the credit facility.

LitigationSettlementGross.label: Litigation Settlement, Gross (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
LitigationSettlementGross.description: This element represents the gross amount awarded, to be received by, or to be remitted to the entity in settlement of litigation occurring during the period.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowance.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Allowance
LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowance.description: Amount of allowance to cover probable credit losses on loans and leases. Includes carryover of or adjustments to the allowance for loan losses in connection with business combinations. Excludes allowance for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net Amount
LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans held for sale.

LoansReceivableNet.label: Loans Receivable, Net (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
LoansReceivableNet.description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Includes loans held for sale. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

MarketableSecurities.label: Marketable Securities
MarketableSecurities.description: Amount of investment in marketable security.

MarketableSecuritiesGainLoss.label: Marketable Securities, Gain (Loss)
MarketableSecuritiesGainLoss.description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in marketable security, including other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

MarketableSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.label: Marketable Securities, Realized Gain (Loss)
MarketableSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in marketable security, including other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

MembersEquity.label: Members' Equity
MembersEquity.description: Amount of ownership interest in limited liability company (LLC), attributable to the parent entity.

MinorityInterestDecreaseFromDistribution.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Decrease from Distributions to Noncontrolling Interest Holders
MinorityInterestDecreaseFromDistribution.description: Decrease in noncontrolling interest balance from payment of dividends or other distributions by the non-wholly owned subsidiary or partially owned entity, included in the consolidation of the parent entity, to the noncontrolling interest holders.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstate.label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate
MortgageLoansOnRealEstate.description: Amount of investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCarryingAmountO.label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Carrying Amount of Mortgages (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCarryingAmountO.description: The carrying amount of the outstanding balance due under the mortgage loan.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCommercialAndCo.label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Commercial and Consumer, Net
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCommercialAndCo.description: The balance represents the amount of loans that are secured by real estate mortgages, offset by the reserve to cover probable credit losses on the loan portfolio.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateForeclosures.label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Foreclosure
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateForeclosures.description: Amount of decrease in investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, from foreclosure.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateNumberOfLoans.label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Number of Loans
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateNumberOfLoans.description: Indicates the number of mortgages under each classification.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAllocatedToLimitedPartners.label: Net Income (Loss) Allocated to Limited Partners
NetIncomeLossAllocatedToLimitedPartners.description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to limited partners.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit, Basic and Diluted, Net of Tax
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.description: The amount of net income or loss for the period per each limited partnership and general partnership unit in instances when basic and diluted earnings per unit are the same amount and aggregated on the face of the financial statements. Basic earnings per unit is the amount of net income or loss for the period per unit outstanding during the reporting period. Diluted earnings per unit includes the amount of net income or loss for the period available to each limited and general partnership unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of units for all dilutive potential units outstanding during the reporting period.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic, Net of Tax
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) available to outstanding limited partnership (LP) unit-holder.

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionValueOfAs.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Value of Assets Acquired
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionValueOfAs.description: "The value of an asset or business acquired in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

NonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Nonoperating Income (Expense)
NonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: The aggregate amount of income or expense from ancillary business-related activities (that is to say, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

NotesAssumed1.label: Notes Assumed
NotesAssumed1.description: The fair value of notes assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

NotesPayable.label: Notes Payable
NotesPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying amount of all types of notes payable, as of the balance sheet date, with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

NotesReceivableFairValueDisclosure.label: Notes Receivable, Fair Value Disclosure
NotesReceivableFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of an agreement for an unconditional promise by the maker to pay the holder a definite sum of money at a future date.

NumberOfRealEstateProperties.label: Number of Real Estate Properties
NumberOfRealEstateProperties.description: The number of real estate properties owned as of the balance sheet date.

NumberOfReportableSegments.label: Number of Reportable Segments
NumberOfReportableSegments.description: Number of segments reported by the entity. A reportable segment is a component of an entity for which there is an accounting requirement to report separate financial information on that component in the entity's financial statements.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OperatingIncomeLoss.label: Operating Income (Loss)
OperatingIncomeLoss.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.label: Other Asset Impairment Charges
OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.description: The charge against earnings resulting from the write down of long lived assets other than goodwill due to the difference between the carrying value and lower fair value.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsale.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Available-for-sale Securities Adjustment, Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsale.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments, of appreciation (loss) in value of unsold available-for-sale securities, attributable to parent entity. Excludes amounts related to other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, after tax and adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Sale of Securities Included in Net Income, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Net of tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, before tax and adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherExpenseFromRealEstatePartnershipOpe.label: Other Expense from Real Estate Partnership Operations
OtherExpenseFromRealEstatePartnershipOpe.description: Amount of selling, general, and administrative expenses, and other expenses, related to investments in real estate partnerships.

OtherGeneralExpense.label: Other General Expense
OtherGeneralExpense.description: Amount of general expenses not normally included in Other Operating Costs and Expenses.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Liabilities, Current
OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherMarketableSecuritiesCurrent.label: Other Marketable Securities, Current (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OtherMarketableSecuritiesCurrent.description: Amount of other investments not classified as trading, available-for-sale or held-to-maturity, expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.label: Other Noncash Income (Expense)
OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) included in net income that results in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingGainsLosses.label: Other Nonoperating Gains (Losses)
OtherNonoperatingGainsLosses.description: Amount of gain (loss) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncome.label: Other Nonoperating Income
OtherNonoperatingIncome.description: Amount of income related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherOwnershipInterestsCumulativeCashDis.label: Other Ownership Interests, Cumulative Cash Distributions
OtherOwnershipInterestsCumulativeCashDis.description: Aggregate cumulative cash distributions made to the other unit holders in a limited partnership or master limited partnership. Does not include limited or general partners' ownership interests.

OtherRealEstateAndForeclosedAssets.label: Other Real Estate and Foreclosed Assets
OtherRealEstateAndForeclosedAssets.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of other real estate and foreclosed assets. Other real estate may include real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations may also be included in real estate owned. Foreclosed assets include all assets obtained in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement through foreclosure proceedings.

OtherRealEstateRevenue.label: Other Real Estate Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OtherRealEstateRevenue.description: Other real estate revenue not otherwise specified in the taxonomy.

OtherRealEstateValuationAdjustments.label: Other Real Estate, Valuation Adjustments
OtherRealEstateValuationAdjustments.description: Valuation adjustments made to other real estate not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations may also be included in real estate owned. This excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure.

OtherRevenueExpenseFromRealEstateOperati.label: Other Revenue (Expense) from Real Estate Operations
OtherRevenueExpenseFromRealEstateOperati.description: Amount of other revenue (expense) derived from real estate investments partnerships.

OtherSignificantNoncashTransactionValueO.label: Other Significant Noncash Transaction, Value of Consideration Given
OtherSignificantNoncashTransactionValueO.description: "The value of the noncash (or part noncash) consideration given (for example, liability, equity) in a transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of a transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

PartnersCapitalDistributionAmountPerShar.label: Partners' Capital, Distribution Amount Per Share
PartnersCapitalDistributionAmountPerShar.description: The distribution amount per share for all classes of units.

PaymentsForFees.label: Payments for Other Fees
PaymentsForFees.description: Amount of cash outflow for fees classified as other.

PaymentsForLegalSettlements.label: Payments for Legal Settlements
PaymentsForLegalSettlements.description: The amount of cash paid for the settlement of litigation or for other legal issues during the period.

PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.label: Payments of Capital Distribution
PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.description: Cash outflow to owners or shareholders, excluding ordinary dividends. Includes special dividends.

PaymentsOfDistributionsToAffiliates.label: Payments of Distributions to Affiliates
PaymentsOfDistributionsToAffiliates.description: The distributions of earnings to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

PaymentsToAcquireMarketableSecurities.label: Payments to Acquire Marketable Securities
PaymentsToAcquireMarketableSecurities.description: Amount of cash outflow for purchase of marketable security.

PaymentsToAcquireRealEstateHeldForInvest.label: Payments to Acquire Real Estate Held-for-investment
PaymentsToAcquireRealEstateHeldForInvest.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of real estate held for investment purposes.

PledgedAssetsNotSeparatelyReportedRealEs.label: Pledged Assets, Not Separately Reported, Real Estate
PledgedAssetsNotSeparatelyReportedRealEs.description: The carrying amount, as of the date of the latest financial statement presented, of real estate owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, primarily a secured borrowing or repurchase agreement, and for which the transferee is not permitted to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedRealEstat.label: Pledged Assets Separately Reported, Real Estate Pledged as Collateral, at Fair Value
PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedRealEstat.description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of real estate which is owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, and that is reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge it.

PremiumsReceivableAllowanceForDoubtfulAc.label: Premium Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
PremiumsReceivableAllowanceForDoubtfulAc.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on premium receivable from recovery.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfNotesReceivable.label: Proceeds from Collection of Notes Receivable
ProceedsFromCollectionOfNotesReceivable.description: The cash inflow associated with principal collections from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromDistributionsReceivedFromRea.label: Proceeds from Distributions Received from Real Estate Partnerships
ProceedsFromDistributionsReceivedFromRea.description: The cash inflow from earnings received from real estate partnerships.

ProceedsFromEquityMethodInvestmentDivide.label: Proceeds from Equity Method Investment, Distribution, Return of Capital
ProceedsFromEquityMethodInvestmentDivide.description: Amount of distribution received from equity method investee for return of investment, classified as investing activities. Excludes distribution for return on investment, classified as operating activities.

ProceedsFromFeesReceived.label: Proceeds from Fees Received
ProceedsFromFeesReceived.description: Cash received for fees during the current period. This element excludes cash proceeds from license fees.

ProceedsFromLegalSettlements.label: Proceeds from Legal Settlements
ProceedsFromLegalSettlements.description: Cash received for the settlement of litigation during the current period.

ProceedsFromLoanAndLeaseOriginationsAndP.label: Proceeds from Loan and Lease Originations and Principal Collections (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ProceedsFromLoanAndLeaseOriginationsAndP.description: The cash inflow or outflow related to a loan origination (the process when securing a mortgage for a piece of real property), lease origination, and principal collections. It is through the origination process that the terms of the mortgage agreement (amount of loan, interest rate, compounding frequency, etc) or lease are established and the involved parties legally bind themselves to the transaction.

ProceedsFromLoanAndLeaseOriginationsAndP.label: Proceeds from Loan and Lease Originations and Principal Collections
ProceedsFromLoanAndLeaseOriginationsAndP.description: Cash inflow related to a loan origination (the process when securing a mortgage for a piece of real property), lease origination, and principal collections.

ProceedsFromNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from Notes Payable
ProceedsFromNotesPayable.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromRecoveriesOfLoanPreviouslyCh.label: Proceeds, Financing Receivable, Previously Written Off, Recovery
ProceedsFromRecoveriesOfLoanPreviouslyCh.description: Amount of cash inflow from recovery of financing receivable, previously written off.

ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfMortgageN.label: Proceeds from Sale and Collection of Mortgage Notes Receivable
ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfMortgageN.description: The cash inflow from proceeds from sale of receivables arising from the mortgage note on real estate; includes collections on mortgage notes receivable that are not classified as operating cash flows.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfMarketableS.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Marketable Securities
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfMarketableS.description: The cash inflow associated with the aggregate amount received by the entity through sale or maturity of marketable securities (held-to-maturity or available-for-sale) during the period.

ProceedsFromSaleOfForeclosedAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Foreclosed Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfForeclosedAssets.description: The cash inflow from the sale assets received in full or partial satisfaction of a receivable including real and personal property; equity interests in corporations, partnerships, and joint ventures; and beneficial interests in trusts. Foreclosed assets also include loans that are treated as if the underlying collateral had been foreclosed because the institution has taken possession of the collateral, even though legal foreclosure or repossession proceedings have not taken place.

ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansHeldForInvestment.label: Proceeds from Sale of Loans Held-for-investment
ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansHeldForInvestment.description: The cash inflow from Sales of Loans Held For Investment.

ProceedsFromSaleOfMortgageLoansHeldForSa.label: Proceeds from Sale of Mortgage Loans Held-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfMortgageLoansHeldForSa.description: The cash inflow from sales of loans that are secured with real estate mortgages and are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

ProceedsFromSaleOfNotesReceivable.label: Proceeds from Sale of Notes Receivable
ProceedsFromSaleOfNotesReceivable.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Assets (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherAssets.description: Cash received from sales of assets, other than those represented by other elements (securities, loans, mortgages, real estate).

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherRealEstate.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Real Estate
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherRealEstate.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of other real estate not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherRealEstateHeldfor.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Real Estate Held-for-investment
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherRealEstateHeldfor.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of other real estate held for investment not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyHeldForSale.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property Held-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyHeldForSale.description: The cash inflow from the sale of formerly productive land held for sale, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstate.label: Proceeds from Sale of Real Estate
ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstate.description: Cash received for the sale of real estate that is not part of an investing activity during the current period.

ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstateHeldforinves.label: Proceeds from Sale of Real Estate Held-for-investment
ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstateHeldforinves.description: Cash received from the sale of real estate that is held for investment, that is, it is part of an investing activity during the period.

ProceedsFromSalesOfBusinessAffiliateAndP.label: Proceeds from Sales of Business, Affiliate and Productive Assets
ProceedsFromSalesOfBusinessAffiliateAndP.description: Aggregate cash proceeds received from a combination of transactions in which noncurrent assets are sold, which may include the sale of a business, an investment in an affiliate (including an equity method investee), property, plant and equipment and intangible assets. Excludes sales of trading, available-for-sale, and held-to-maturity securities.

ProfessionalFees.label: Professional Fees
ProfessionalFees.description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

ProfitLossFromRealEstateOperations.label: Profit (Loss) from Real Estate Operations
ProfitLossFromRealEstateOperations.description: The net cost of operation of other real estate (including provisions for real estate losses, rental income, and gains and losses on sales of real estate).

ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.label: Accounts Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable.

ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.label: Provision for Loan and Lease Losses
ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.description: Amount of expense related to estimated loss from loan and lease transactions.

ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.label: Financing Receivable, Credit Loss, Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.description: Amount of credit loss expense (reversal of expense) for financing receivable.

RealEstateAcquiredThroughForeclosure.label: Real Estate Acquired Through Foreclosure
RealEstateAcquiredThroughForeclosure.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of land and buildings obtained through foreclosure proceedings or defeasance in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement.

RealEstateAcquisitionsThroughForeclosure.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Acquisition Through Foreclosure
RealEstateAcquisitionsThroughForeclosure.description: Amount of real estate investments acquired through foreclosure for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateHeldforsale.label: Real Estate Held-for-sale
RealEstateHeldforsale.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of investments in land and buildings held for sale, excluding real estate considered to be inventory of the entity.

RealEstateTaxExpense.label: Real Estate Tax Expense
RealEstateTaxExpense.description: A tax based on the assessed value of real estate by the local government. The tax is usually based on the value of property (including the land).

RecognitionOfDeferredRevenue.label: Recognition of Deferred Revenue
RecognitionOfDeferredRevenue.description: The amount of previously reported deferred or unearned revenue that was recognized as revenue during the period. For cash flows, this element primarily pertains to amortization of deferred credits on long-term arrangements. As a noncash item, it is deducted from net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

RelatedPartyTransactionAmountsOfTransact.label: Related Party Transaction, Amounts of Transaction
RelatedPartyTransactionAmountsOfTransact.description: Amount of transactions with related party during the financial reporting period.

RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Repayments of Notes Payable
RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SalesOfRealEstate.label: Sales of Real Estate (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesOfRealEstate.description: Revenue from the sale of commercial, industrial, or residential property during the period. This element is more likely than not relevant to an entity for which real estate operations are a principal activity. If real estate operations are not a principal activity, the reporting entity would likely use a gain (loss) on sale of property, plant, or equipment type element.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

TechnologyServicesCosts.label: Technology Services Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
TechnologyServicesCosts.description: Costs incurred in providing technology services. The services may include training, installation, engineering or consulting. Consulting services often include implementation support, software design or development, or the customization or modification of the licensed software.

WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.label: Weighted Average Limited Partnership Units Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.description: Weighted average number of limited partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfLimitedPartnershi.label: Weighted Average Number of Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfLimitedPartnershi.description: The average number of limited partnership and general partnership units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per limited partnership and general partnership unit.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.
